amendment.description: Amendment prohibits use of funds to eliminate the two river navigator positions, including the contract position, for the Hudson River and Upper Susquehanna/Lackawanna Rivers or to alter the tasks assigned to the persons filling such positions.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds to eliminate the two river navigator positions , including the contract position, for the Hudson River and Upper Susquehanna/Lackawanna Rivers or to alter the tasks assigned to the persons filling such positions.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hinchey amendment (A014) Agreed to by voice vote.
